channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samsung’s Harman Agrees To Acquire Auto Computer Unit From ZF Group
item.description: Samsung's Harman, looking to expand its automotive electronics capabilities announced an agreement to acquire a unit of ZF Group.

item.title: Honor Magic8 Lite: A Practical Alternative To All The Pro Smartphones

item.title: DHS Finalizes Controversial Immigration Rule On H-1B Lottery
item.description: The Trump administration has finalized a controversial immigration rule that will significantly change the H-1B selection process.

item.title: Peri-Retirement—Prepare For A Rewarding Life, During And After Work

item.title: 5 Ways To Prevent Back Pain This Holiday Season: A Neurosurgeon’s Guide
item.description: Why is there more back pain during the holidays? How can I prevent back pain during the holidays? When should I be worried about my back pain?
